overview: As the video opens on shots of the five young men around the billiard table, two are making eyes at each other. Shortly, they (Hunter & Jason) leave to go to their hotel room for sex. As the video returns to the billiard game, Turk & Winter begin a new game with new rules... strip pool. While Tyler watches and then masturbates from the doorway, they quickly discover gay sex. In the second set of scenes, Tyler & Hunter are comparing penis sizes in a hotel room before getting it on. This time Jason masturbates from a doorway while watching them. Lastly in another hotel room Turk & Winter are watching TV, discuss the previous encounter and their sexuality, before reprising that said encounter.
title: Bareback Mountain
